property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, put any number of creatures that have power 12000 or more into your hand, and the rest into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. {MANA ARMS} 5: if you have 5 or more nature cards in your mana zone, choose another one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose a nature creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't attack if you don't have other creatures in the battle zone that have power 12000 or more.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a creature that has power 12000 or more, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add all creatures that have power 12000 or more from among them to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-05 Ou Kabuto Mach Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a creature that has power 12000 or more into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal a creature that has power 12000 or more from your hand. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
